rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
增强青少年体质可降低精神障碍风险研究表明，儿童和青少年的心肺健康、肌肉耐力和肌肉力量水平较高，可显着降低患焦虑、抑郁和注意力缺陷多动症的风险，这表明身体健康对青少年精神障碍起着至关重要的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Boosting-physical-fitness-in-youth-linked-to-lower-mental-disorder-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Boosting-physical-fitness-in-youth-linked-to-lower-mental-disorder-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3e950a9-af0e-4551-949f-2a922b59a828 Wed, 01 May 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Boosting physical fitness in youth linked to lower mental disorder risks
支持人工智能的心电图系统通过识别高危患者显着降低医院死亡率《自然医学》的一项研究评估了人工智能心电图 (ECG) 系统识别有死亡风险的住院患者的能力，证明了其通过实时警报和风险分层增强快速反应系统 (RRS) 来降低死亡率的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/AI-enabled-ECG-system-significantly-reduces-hospital-mortality-rates-by-identifying-at-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/AI-enabled-ECG-system-significantly-reduces-hospital-mortality-rates-by-identifying-at-risk-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=043e92d8-b326-418e-947c-37d5782b3532 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 23:55:00 -0400 AI-enabled ECG system significantly reduces hospital mortality rates by identifying at-risk patients
研究调查了 UV-A 暴露后人角膜内皮细胞的衰老表型一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 8 期封面上，题为“人类角膜的衰老特征”内皮细胞在紫外线 A 照射下的变化。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-investigates-senescent-phenotypes-of- human-corneal-endothelial-cells-upon-UV-A-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-investigates-senescent-phenotypes-of- human-corneal-endothelial-cells-upon-UV-A-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f5e8a97-51ca-4123-b7ed-db6c73e7f6d0 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 23:52:37 -0400 Study investigates senescent phenotypes of human corneal endothelial cells upon UV-A exposure
影响蠕虫行为的基因被发现与人类神经系统疾病相关作为德克萨斯大学阿灵顿荣誉学院的一名本科生，Hannah Selvarathinam 知道她想进行研究。在UTA第一年快结束时，这位凯勒本地人联系了生物学实验室助理教授Piya Ghose。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Genes-affecting-worm-b​​ehavior-found-to-be-relevant-to-neurological-disease-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Genes-affecting-worm-b​​ehavior-found-to-be-relevant-to-neurological-disease-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adf5f6bc-968d-4be9-aaba-1232f1976573 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 23:46:14 -0400 Genes affecting worm behavior found to be relevant to neurological disease in humans
电脉冲促进肝细胞对基因治疗的吸收为了改善昂贵的医疗服务，威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校的电气工程研究团队开发了一种刺激方法，可以使人体更容易接受某些基因疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Electric-pulses-boost-gene-therapy-uptake-in-liver-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Electric-pulses-boost-gene-therapy-uptake-in-liver-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d69e8e2d-2ba7-41cb-b1a2-071c9185b604 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 23:37:06 -0400 Electric pulses boost gene therapy uptake in liver cells
揭开长寿造血干细胞的秘密没有什么东西可以永生，但与体内其他细胞相比，造血干细胞（HSC）的寿命却非常长。造血干细胞是造血细胞，它们产生快速分裂的祖细胞，进而产生数千亿个细胞，以满足输送氧气的红细胞、抗病白细胞和形成血栓的血小板的日常需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-long-lived-hematopoietic-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-long-lived-hematopoietic-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd9ceae8-49d4-48a2-9dd1-0d5d792c34f6 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 23:24:13 -0400 Unlocking the secrets of long-lived hematopoietic stem cells
患有严重精神疾病的人更有可能患有身体健康合并症昆士兰大学研究人员进行的一项大规模国际研究发现，患有严重精神疾病（例如精神分裂症或双相情感障碍）的人患有两种或两种以上慢性身体健康状况的可能性高出四倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/People-with-severe-mental-illness-more-likely-to-have-physical-health-comorbidities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/People-with-severe-mental-illness-more-likely-to-have-physical-health-comorbidities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6becac30-9bbf-4df8-85d7-be804312f7c7 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 23:17:00 -0400 People with severe mental illness more likely to have physical health comorbidities
研究为数百万患有复杂区域疼痛综合症的人带来了希望复杂区域疼痛综合症 (CRPS) 是一种慢性且令人衰弱的疼痛疾病，通常被认为是终生的，治疗选择有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Research-offers-hope-to-millions-of-people-with-complex-regional-pain-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Research-offers-hope-to-millions-of-people-with-complex-regional-pain-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dba7f81-15da-4567-adb5-9c64da0245eb Tue, 30 Apr 2024 22:54:58 -0400 Research offers hope to millions of people with complex regional pain syndrome
研究强调胰腺癌细胞因位置而异一项新的研究发现，胰腺癌细胞根据其在胰腺中的位置而有所不同，这提供了有关肿瘤的新信息，从而可以带来更好的靶向治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-highlights-differences-in-pancreatic-cancer-cells-based-on-location.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-highlights-differences-in-pancreatic-cancer-cells-based-on-location.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be2f0f4d-0d61-4541-8044-954646cad399 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 22:47:10 -0400 Study highlights differences in pancreatic cancer cells based on location
戒烟药物的破坏与可避免的死亡有关伦敦大学学院（UCL）研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，帮助人们戒烟的处方药供应中断可能导致英国每年戒烟人数减少数千人，这将导致未来可以避免的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Disruption-of-smoking-cessation-medicine-linked-to-avoidable-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Disruption-of-smoking-cessation-medicine-linked-to-avoidable-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=430509be-351f-46c8-8474-c002b4841264 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 22:40:09 -0400 Disruption of smoking cessation medicine linked to avoidable deaths
